name: FIFSRegistrar
description: A registrar that allocates subdomains to the first person to claim them.

functionDecorators.name: register
functionDecorators.description: Register a name, or change the owner of an existing registration.

parameterDecorators.name: label
parameterDecorators.description: The hash of the label to register.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new owner.
